txt.en: You have destroyed many Orkish provisions at Kamaz-kala.
Far from the store-halls of Moria, the Orcs stationed at Kamaz-kala depend on their meagre supply of provisions.
By destroying their provisions, you have done much to hinder the Orcs gathered at Kamaz-kala.
Orkish provisions can be found at Kamaz-kala at Azanulbizar.\n\nYou should destroy Orkish provisions at Kamaz-kala.
Orkish provisions can be found at Kamaz-kala at Azanulbizar.\n\nYou should destroy Orkish provisions at Kamaz-kala.

At the very edge of Azanulbizar, the Orkish fort of Kamaz-kala guards the border of Azog's realm. There, the Orcs toil to keep out all unwanted invaders, especially the dwarves of the Haban'akkâ. However, it seems these Orcs must survive upon a meagre supply of rations. If their rations were depleted, they might be more easily overrun by the Haban'akkâ.\n\nYou should destroy Orkish provisions at Kamaz-kala.
